channel.description: Welcome to the Russell Feldhausen Pronouns: he/him (785) 292-3121 (Call/Text) 2213 Engineering Hall (working remotely) russfeld AT ksu DOT edu https://russfeld.me - @russfeld Other Instructors & TAs Emily Alfs-Votipka Nathan Bean George "Bud" LaVezzi Joshua Weese Dr. Scott DeLoach Contact russfeld AT ksu DOT edu Image Credit: Codio Course Structure Lectures, Quizzes, Projects Gated - Must Complete in Order Work Around your Schedule Automated Grading Module 0 - Introduction Navigating Canvas & Codio Syllabus Where to Get Help Plagiarism Extra Credit Course Readiness Quiz Syllabus Contract Between Teacher & Student Read Carefully Ask Questions Diversity Statement Netiquette Subject to Change Late Work Each Module has a Due Date Complete ALL Work in Module Still Must Complete Module Don't Get Behind! What's Different? No Scheduled Class Times Work Around Your Schedule Automated Grading Long Lectures Short Videos Textbooks Online Tutorials Complex IDE Codio Required Supplies Access to a Modern Web Browser Broadband Internet Connection Subject to Change Image Credit: Vantaj on DeviantArt
